channel.title: Looking for helpfull coders [PI]
channel.description:
hi i have been working on [PI] base for a while now and editing things adding new stuff and so on although this is extremely fun and interesting i cant do it alone i am looking for someone who is interested in helping with the promotion and updating of my most recent project this is an economy based pk server
here are some pics:[img]http://img52.imageshack.us/img52/4136/101228005905.png[/img] pk point shop
DONATOR ONLY SHOP: [img]http://img52.imageshack.us/img52/5872/101228005930.png[/img]
new and improved (also good looking!) shops: [img]http://img52.imageshack.us/img52/5406/101228010000.png[/img]
tons of commands (you cant see more than half of them in this pic): [img]http://img52.imageshack.us/img52/149/101228010020.png[/img]
hd inventory and chaotics/one custom black phat) [img]http://img52.imageshack.us/img52/1922/101228010137.png[/img]
clickable spawning!!: [img]http://img52.imageshack.us/img52/7212/101228010222.png[/img]
all godswords /calws and all wepons and gf'x all work 100%: [img]http://img52.imageshack.us/img52/9076/101228010301.png[/img]
correct venge gfx's(soon to come venge-other and special transfer): [img]http://img52.imageshack.us/img52/7765/101228020853.png[/img]
click your stats to change them working 100% also a ::master and ::pure command: [img]http://img52.imageshack.us/img52/1120/101228021028.png[/img]
new hitpoints bars added!(soul split soon to come): [img]http://img52.imageshack.us/img52/876/101228010334u.png[/img]
turmoil added :): [img]http://img824.imageshack.us/img824/3238/101213235958.png[/img]
so far i have showed you the basics all dupes that i know of in [PI] are fixed currently (need help finding/testing them all) also looking for someone to possible set up a fourm and i will soon have a web host wanting to make a webclient i already have a vps and am ready to host the server anyone who helps will possible get profits from donations and credits ofc to the server project thanks for reading :) if you want to talk add my msn: smokes_blunts@live.com

item.title: Looking for helpfull coders [PI]
item.dc:creator: @SunSpec221 SunSpec221
item.description:
@SunSpec221 wrote:

Ta1nt3d,

Here is my constructive cristism,

  1. Keep the customs if you want them
  2. Your base is good
  3. Awesome that you got prayer to work.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for helpfull coders [PI]
item.dc:creator: @_Troll-Scape ✆™☯Troll-Scape☯™✆
item.description:
@_Troll-Scape wrote:

[quote=“ta1nt3d, post:1, topic:375406”]hi i have been working on [PI] base for a while now and editing things adding new stuff and so on
although this is extremely fun and interesting i cant do it alone
i am looking for someone who is interested in helping with the promotion and updating of my most recent project
this is an economy based pk server

here are some pics: pk point shop

DONATOR ONLY SHOP:

new and improved (also good looking!) shops:

tons of commands (you cant see more than half of them in this pic):

hd inventory and chaotics/one custom black phat)

clickable spawning!!:

all godswords /calws and all wepons and gf’x all work 100%:

correct venge gfx’s(soon to come venge-other and special transfer):

click your stats to change them working 100% also a ::master and ::pure command:

new hitpoints bars added!(soul split soon to come):

turmoil added :):

so far i have showed you the basics
all dupes that i know of in [PI] are fixed currently (need help finding/testing them all)
also looking for someone to possible set up a fourm and i will soon have a web host
wanting to make a webclient i already have a vps and am ready to host the server
anyone who helps will possible get profits from donations and credits ofc to the server project
thanks for reading
if you want to talk add my msn: smokes_blunts@live.com[/quote]
good news you just found your man ill add you on msn ok? wee will speak there kk?

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for helpfull coders [PI]
item.dc:creator: @ta1nt3d ta1nt3d
item.description:
@ta1nt3d wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:4, topic:375406”][quote author=ta1nt3d link=topic=471363.msg3447547#msg3447547 date=1293526487]

The server has been ruined from customs.
[/quote]theres only one signle custom EVER also i didnt ask your opinion on the server i asked for a helping hand
so keep the nerd - comments to a minimum please.

Your suppose to be glad that someone even bothers to take the time to give constructive criticism about the server. I would recommend removing the customs, and I see a lot more customs than just one. Other than that, the server looks alright.[/quote]
i must have missunderstood you sorry for that
also my opinion on customs may differ from yours and i appreciate yours thanks for saying it looks nice this is my first time ever coding so i dont think i did to bad

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for helpfull coders [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“ta1nt3d, post:3, topic:375406”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=471363.msg3447544#msg3447544 date=1293526231]
The server has been ruined from customs.
[/quote]theres only one signle custom EVER also i didnt ask your opinion on the server i asked for a helping hand
so keep the nerd - comments to a minimum please.[/quote]
Your suppose to be glad that someone even bothers to take the time to give constructive criticism about the server. I would recommend removing the customs, and I see a lot more customs than just one. Other than that, the server looks alright.

Read full topic
